title: Missing Gift?
body:
Ok, so a while back my friend gifted me Pool Party Lulu. Recently I hovered over Lulu and saw that I had the classic skin on which I found odd. I went  to see if I still had the skin and it said that I didn't own it. I'm really confused because I definitely played with the skin and a different friend says he remembers me playing Lulu mid with it. I have two reasons why this might have occurred but I'm not sure.

1. My friend is now banned
2. I changed my name

I don't know if these happening should actually affect a gift that I was given like six+ months ago but not really sure.

replies.body: You'll have to [submit a support ticket](http://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for that one, we can't help you here unfortunately. You may have to verify ownership of the account (by way of answering a whole bunch of questions), but just work through it with support and they can tell you what's up.
Ok, thanks! Submitting my support ticket now ^^.

No worries, I wouldn't get your hopes up for getting the content back though, it sounds like your friend made a chargeback and was banned until they pay it back, in which case that content is gone because they basically didn't pay for it.

It could be something else though, support will help you out either way :)
